SELECT COUNT(E_CODE) FROM WD_EXPERT WHERE 1=1
AND E_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND E_LOCATION LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

SELECT E_ID, E_CODE, E_PWD, E_NAME, E_EMAIL, E_LOCATION, E_GENDER, E_STATUS, REG_DATE, E_IMGNAME, E_HASHTAG, E_CONTENT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, E_ID, E_CODE, E_PWD, E_NAME, E_EMAIL, E_LOCATION, E_GENDER, E_STATUS, REG_DATE, E_IMGNAME, E_HASHTAG, E_CONTENT FROM (SELECT E_ID AS E_ID, E_CODE AS E_CODE, NVL(E_PWD, '') AS E_PWD, NVL(E_NAME, '') AS E_NAME, NVL(E_EMAIL, '') AS E_EMAIL, NVL(E_LOCATION, '') AS E_LOCATION, NVL(E_GENDER, '') AS E_GENDER, NVL(E_STATUS, '') AS E_STATUS, NVL(REG_DATE, '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(E_IMGNAME, '') AS E_IMGNAME, NVL(E_HASHTAG, '') AS E_HASHTAG, NVL(E_CONTENT, '') AS E_CONTENT FROM WD_EXPERT WHERE 1=1
AND E_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND E_LOCATION LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY E_CODE ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT E_ID AS E_ID, E_CODE AS E_CODE, NVL(E_PWD, '') AS E_PWD, NVL(E_NAME, '') AS E_NAME, NVL(E_EMAIL, '') AS E_EMAIL, NVL(E_LOCATION, '') AS E_LOCATION, NVL(E_GENDER, '') AS E_GENDER, NVL(E_STATUS, '') AS E_STATUS, NVL(REG_DATE, '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(E_IMGNAME, '') AS E_IMGNAME, NVL(E_HASHTAG, '') AS E_HASHTAG, NVL(E_CONTENT, '') AS E_CONTENT FROM WD_EXPERT WHERE E_CODE = #{value}
